title: Lowering Of The Barr, How To Flirt 12.4.19
itunes:title: Lowering Of The Barr, How To Flirt 12.4.19
description:
In episode 528, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and activist Francis Cronin to discuss the Apple Music Awards, William Barr not liking the investigative report he ordered, 2020 Democratic primary polls, Obama's thoughts on the current Democratic candidates, Kamala Harris suspending her campaign, the best pick up lines that work on men, the Peloton bike ad, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Apple announces first ever Apple Music Awards
  2. Barr disputes key inspector general finding about FBI’s Russia investigation
  3. Waiting for Obama
  4. National 2020 Democratic Presidential Primary Polls
  5. I am suspending my campaign today
  6. What Pick-Up Lines Work Best (on Men)?
  7. Peloton's perplexing new holiday ad has incensed the internet
  8. WATCH: Menahan Street Band - The Contender

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
